name: Escape Prison: framed 4 murder
description:
You're a prisoner under close surveillance, there are guards all around and every exit is blocked by computer systems.
There are objects around you that may help you, try to use them or combine them.
Codes and passwords are scattered all around, you have to find ways to use them for your purpose.
You are not alone in prison, perhaps other inmates can help you if you help them.
If you want to try your hand at an adventure game full of suspense and fun, then try this Escape Game!
